title: Ticket #7457: merge old-inotify patch from Python distributions
description:
Jason Patton has been maintaining a small patch required to build the Python bindings for pip -- HTCondor uses a newer inotify interface than the build container supports. Changes to the inotify code (#7373) caused the patch not to apply. While this should have been noticed earlier in the release process, it could have caused the release to have been delayed.

Merging the patch into the mainline should prevent this problem from reoccurring, as well as simplify building the bindings for pip.
